job_tasks.justification: Developing backend services and APIs is a fundamental task in software engineering.

job_tasks.justification: This involves integrating AI capabilities into a software application, which falls under software development.

job_tasks.justification: Managing data flow and functionality between different parts of an application is a key software development responsibility.

job_tasks.justification: Database management is a critical aspect of building and maintaining software applications.

job_tasks.justification: Performance optimization, scalability, and security are all integral parts of the software development lifecycle.

job_tasks.justification: Testing, debugging, and fixing issues are standard practices in software development.

job_tasks.justification: Ensuring compliance with security and privacy standards is a crucial part of developing secure software.
The job description explicitly mentions building an 'AI-powered' assistant, indicating the application will utilize AI models.

job_tasks.phrase: leverage cutting-edge AI and NLP technologies
job_tasks.justification: This phrase highlights the use and integration of AI and NLP technologies, which are core to modeling.

job_tasks.phrase: integrate machine learning models into the application
job_tasks.justification: This directly refers to the integration of ML models, which is a key aspect of the modeling task.

job_tasks.phrase: supporting the AI model and other application features
job_tasks.justification: This mention implies interaction with and support for AI models within the application's functionality.

job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate with the AI and data science teams
be entrepreneurial, take ownership, be creative

soft_skills.phrase: Collaborate with the AI and data science teams
be entrepreneurial, take ownership, be creative

classification.rationale: While the job mentions AI and NLP technologies and integrating ML models, the primary focus is on Full Stack Development tasks like frontend, backend, and database management. The role does not demonstrate core responsibilities of an ML Engineer or GenAI Engineer such as advanced prompt engineering, RAG systems, or model fine-tuning. The AI aspect appears to be the consumption and integration of existing models rather than their deep development or adaptation.
